Module edu.citadel.compiler
Package edu.citadel.compiler.util

Class ByteUtil

java.lang.Object
edu.citadel.compiler.util.ByteUtil
public class ByteUtil
extends java.lang.Object
Methods to convert integers and characters to byte representations, and vice versa.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ByteUtil()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static char bytesToChar​(byte b0, byte b1)
    Converts 2 bytes to a char.
    static java.lang.String bytesToHex​(byte[] bytes)
    Convert an array of bytes to a string of hexadecimal digits separated by spaces.
    static int bytesToInt​(byte b0, byte b1, byte b2, byte b3)
    Converts 4 bytes to an int.
    static java.lang.String byteToHexString​(byte b)
    Convert a single byte to a string of 2 hexadecimal digits.
    static byte[] charToBytes​(char c)
    Converts a char to an array of 2 bytes.
    static java.lang.String charToHexString​(char c)
    Convert a 2-byte char to a string of 4 hexadecimal digits.
    static byte[] intToBytes​(int n)
    Converts an int to an array of 4 bytes.
    static byte[] shortToBytes​(short n)
    Converts a short to an array of 2 bytes.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ByteUtil

      public ByteUtil()

  • Method Details

    • byteToHexString

      public static java.lang.String byteToHexString​(byte b)
      Convert a single byte to a string of 2 hexadecimal digits.

    • charToHexString

      public static java.lang.String charToHexString​(char c)
      Convert a 2-byte char to a string of 4 hexadecimal digits.

    • bytesToHex

      public static java.lang.String bytesToHex​(byte[] bytes)
      Convert an array of bytes to a string of hexadecimal digits separated by spaces.

    • bytesToChar

      public static char bytesToChar​(byte b0, byte b1)
      Converts 2 bytes to a char. The bytes passed as arguments are ordered with b0 as the high order byte and b1 as the low order byte.

    • bytesToInt

      public static int bytesToInt​(byte b0, byte b1, byte b2, byte b3)
      Converts 4 bytes to an int. The bytes passed as arguments are ordered with b0 as the high order byte and b3 as the low order byte.

    • charToBytes

      public static byte[] charToBytes​(char c)
      Converts a char to an array of 2 bytes. The bytes in the return array are ordered with the one at index 0 as the high order byte and the one at index 1 as the low order byte.

    • shortToBytes

      public static byte[] shortToBytes​(short n)
      Converts a short to an array of 2 bytes. The bytes in the return array are ordered with the one at index 0 as the high order byte and the one at index 1 as the low order byte.

    • intToBytes

      public static byte[] intToBytes​(int n)
      Converts an int to an array of 4 bytes. The bytes in the return array are ordered with the one at index 0 as the high order byte and the one at index 3 as the low order byte.
